triples.name: Deep learning
triples.relevance: Core method discussed as key technology for achieving human-level intelligence through hierarchical neural networks.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Essential machine learning paradigm for training agents to maximize rewards through interaction with environments.

triples.name: Artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: The overarching field aiming to create systems with human-level or super-human cognitive capabilities.

triples.name: World models
triples.relevance: Mentioned in paper title as an important concept for AI systems to understand and predict environmental dynamics.

triples.name: Neuroscience
triples.relevance: Provides biological foundations for understanding how deep and reinforcement learning relate to brain functions and learning mechanisms.

triples.name: Human intelligence
triples.relevance: The benchmark and target capability that AI systems aim to achieve or surpass through deep and reinforcement learning methods.
